meanings.sent1: In a decad, many changes can happen.
meanings.sent2: The school celebrated its centennial with a decad of growth.
meanings.sent3: During the decad, the town's population doubled!
meanings.sent4: The decad of the 1920s brought about significant social changes.
meanings.sent5: The decad of the 90s was a time of great technological advancement.

meanings.definition: A group or set of ten.
meanings.sent1: She bought a decad of colorful balloons for the party.
meanings.sent2: The store offered a special discount for a decad of items.
meanings.sent3: The decad of cupcakes disappeared quickly at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The decad of books on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent5: He counted out a decad of marbles to play with.

meanings.sent1: The once grand mansion now stood in decad.
meanings.sent2: The decad of the old building was evident in its crumbling walls.
meanings.sent3: Despite its decad, the antique clock still ticked.
meanings.sent4: The decad of the forest was a haunting sight.
meanings.sent5: The decad of the once vibrant neighborhood saddened the residents.
